# amalitech-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute              | Description                                                                                   | Type                  | Default     |
| -------------------- | ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`           | `disabled`             | The disabled state of the card. If set to true, interactions would not be alowed,             | `boolean`             | `false`     |
| `href`               | `href`                 | The href attribute of the card. If set, the card would render as an anchor tag.               | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `target`             | `target`               | The target attribute of the card. If href is set, the target defaults to _blank               | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `withHoverAnimation` | `with-hover-animation` | The hover animation state of the card. If set to true, the card would have a hover animation. | `boolean`             | `false`     |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                             | Description                                                                                                                |
| -------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--backgroundColor`              | Background color of the card, default is `#f6f6f8`;                                                                        |
| `--card-body-padding-horizontal` | Padding left and right of the card body, default is `1.25rem`;                                                             |
| `--card-body-padding-vertical`   | Padding top and bottom of the card body, default is `1.25rem`;                                                             |
| `--card-radius`                  | Border radius of the card, default is `0.5rem`;                                                                            |
| `--card-shadow`                  | Box shadow of the card, default is `0px 8px 32px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.1), 0px 4px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.1)`;          |
| `--card-shadow-hover`            | Box shadow of the card on hover, default is `0px 8px 32px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.2), 0px 4px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.2)`; |
| `--textColor`                    | Text color of the card, default is `#474d66`;                                                                              |
